螿字的基本解释

螿
jiāng
见“螀”。

螿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāng］
［《廣韻》即良切，平陽，精。］
“螀1”的繁体字。
即寒螿。也称寒蝉。

螿字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螿； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1095第30
【唐韻】卽良切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】資良切，?音將。【玉篇】寒螿，蟬屬。【方言·郭註】寒蜩，螿也，似蟬而小色靑。　【正韻】亦作?。

螿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
螿字的起名意思

暂无。

Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāng］
["Guangyun" is good cut, Pingyang, fine. ]
"螀1" in traditional characters.
That is, cold scorpion. Also called chilling cicada.
Stubborn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　螀; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1095 30
[Tang Yun] 卽 good cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] good cut, sound general. [Jade articles] cold chrysanthemum, genus cicada. [Dialect·Guo's Note] It is cold, stubborn, like a cicada but small in color.　【Zheng Yun】also made?.
